Moved my site to Git

30 Sep 2015

Reading time ~1 minute

So, I didn't really move it to Git, I manage my site with Git now. I was using SCP to upload updates to my webserver. But that was getting a little old. SO, I setup Git on my webserver and now I can upload the changes and track them. But it's also much easier to upload changes. One of the biggest is if I remove something, Git will track that and remove it from the Git repo on the server, before I just

and then SCP the files back up. Yeah, but now everything is easier now :-).
